# items

**Instance Property**

The dynamic items associated with the current field behavior.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var items: [any UIDynamicItem] { get }
```

## Discussion

When it is enabled, the current field applies its behavior to all of the items in the array.

## Managing the associated dynamic items

- **addItem(_:)**: Associates the field behavior with the specified dynamic item.
- **removeItem(_:)**: Removes the field behavior from the specified dynamic item.

items.description: Associates the field behavior with the specified dynamic item.
items.name: addItem(_:)

items.description: Removes the field behavior from the specified dynamic item.
items.name: removeItem(_:)
